roleset.name: attach

alias.framenet: Rope_manipulation Knot_creation Cause_confinement Attaching Make_cognitive_connection Closure

roleset.note: TIE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls mix-22.1-2, tape-22.4. (from tie.01-v)

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Not only is [development of the new company's initial machine]-1 tied *trace*-1 directly to Mr. Cray, so is its balance sheet.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John tied the packages with twine.

example.name: attribute
example.text: Allianz said in its statement that it was acting to protect that interest , which-1 *T*-1 ties it to Navigation Mixte as a partner .

roleset.name: score the same
roleset.note: TIE-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from tie.03-v)

example.name: pithiest? barrage? who swallowed the dictionary?
example.text: The pithiest testimony to their domination of the just-concluded tournament came from Giants' manager Roger Craig after his team had fallen in Game Three to a five-home-run barrage that-1 *trace*-1 tied a 61-year-old Series record.

roleset.name: attach
roleset.note: TIE_IN-V NOTES: Basically the same as "tie" above but instrument and attribute are notexpected to appear. (from tie.02-v)

role.descr: second thing, tied in with/to what

example.name: passive
example.text: For years, [the company's ads]-1 were tied *trace*-1 in with pitches for Cannon sheets or Martex towels.
example.arg: with pitches for Cannon sheets or Martex towels.

example.name: kinky stuff
example.text: [Mary]-1 likes *trace*-1 to tie John up and tease him with chocolate cake.

example.name: not nearly as interesting
example.text: [About $70 billion]-1 is estimated *trace*-1 to be tied up in the short-term money market, which acts both as a hedge against inflation for consumers and an accelerator of inflation and deficits for the government.
example.arg: in the short-term money market, which acts both as a hedge against inflation for consumers and an accelerator of inflation and deficits for the government

example.name: no clever example name
example.text: Mr. Mengistu is in an increasingly weak position: [Half his army]-1 is tied *trace*-1 down defending the northern city of Asmara from the Eritreans.
example.arg: defending the northern city of Asmara from the Eritreans
